column4: hi, does anyone know anything about Dell LCD monitors?  I just bought a used one (and yes, I saw it before I bought it), and when I had issues with resolution, I started playing with the xorg.conf file, but now I'm getting a blank screen.  When I turn it on, the lamp flickers on for a second, then flickers off.  The LED is initially green, then becomes yellow.  What does this mean?
try reconfigure x. may be you put resoluton that your monitor doesn't supports
press atl+ctrl+f1, do you see the login prompt?
then its not problem with ubuntu. try some hardware techies
